text:
A really lovely hotel very convenient for an arrival or departure at Changi airport as the train is a 5 minute walk away. Beautiful hotel - very clean reception area on arrival. Really interesting metal art work on the walls.
Our room was large and very comfortable and clean. A great shower! We will use this hotel again when returning to Singapore

Extremely convenient location if you have an overnight layover in Changi Airport.
It is attached to a shopping center that has many restaurants, stores and a Fairprice supermarket.  Spacious rooms with kitchenettes .

The rooms are clean, and the service staff are very friendly and helpful as well.

Rooms are also spacious considering the price. Likely due to the location being abit further away from central.

If you aren't looking to travel to the central frequently, and maybe looking to explore around the east of singapore, I'd highly recommend this hotel

The rooms were modern and spacious, featuring a contemporary design with comfortable furnishings. I appreciated the amenities, including a well-equipped kitchenette and a cozy seating area, which made my stay even more enjoyable. Check-in and check-out were smooth. The hotel boasts great facilities, including a well-maintained gym, a refreshing pool, and a stylish lounge area. There is Changi City Point nearby and NTUC supermarket.

Today came here to stay at dorsett! Previously i went here when it was name as capri by fraser. Was a very enjoyable stay!! Highly recommend and this coming April i will stay here again but this time as Dorsett name cannot wait to see how it will look like.
